messages.subject: Re: site suggestions
messages.msgSnippet: Well, I think you are doing your email in HTML format, which works fine on webpages -- but not for everyone recieving them email. I would suggest doing the
messages.messageBody:
Well, I think you are doing your email in HTML format, which works fine on
webpages -- but not for everyone recieving them email.

I would suggest doing the URLs by themselves (ie. http://www.blah.com ;
instead of something like <a href="http://www.blah.com">The Blah
Homeschooling Page</a>) I hope I'm making sense *s*

~Eryn

==
"I dreamed I was a butterfly, flitting around in the sky;
then I awoke. Now I wonder: Am I a man who dreamt of
being a butterfuly, or am I a butterfly dreaming that I am
a man?" - Chuang Tsu
http://www.camenaworks.com/Eryn/
#24591173 ::she just is::
AIM :: Opal Fayre

>Diana

From: "::she just is::" <OmegaMolecule@...>
Looks cool! But can you send them out with just the addressesthemselves
instead of the "A href" stuff? It'd be a lot easier for me toclick them and
check them out then. Thanks! ~Eryn==
